Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by TakeoHonorable
local Tool = script.Parent Tool.Enabled = true
local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
local Player,Character,Humanoid,Root
local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote")
local Properties = { BaseDamage = 24, Special = true, MiniSpecial = true, }
local Animations = {}
local Grips = { In = Tool:WaitForChild("NormalGrip").Value, }
local Sounds = { SlashSound = Handle:WaitForChild("SlashSound"), QuakeSound = Handle:WaitForChild("QuakeSound"), SpecialReady = Handle:WaitForChild("SpecialReady"), SplashSound = Handle:WaitForChild("SplashSound") }
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), ReplicatedStorage = (game:FindService("ReplicatedStorage") or game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")), Lighting = (game:FindService("Lighting") or game:GetService("Lighting")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")), InsertService = (game:FindService("InsertService") or game:GetService("InsertService")), }
WaveModel = Services.InsertService:LoadAsset(212226090) local Wave = WaveModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() Wave.Size = Vector3.new(10, 3.5, 20)*2 WaveModel:Destroy()
local function Wait(para) -- bypasses the latency local Initial = tick() repeat Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() until tick()-Initial >= para end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function IsInTable(Table,Value) for i,v in pairs(Table) do if v == Value then return true end end return false end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
local Touch function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Root = Character:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart") Player = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) local AnimFolder = Tool:WaitForChild("Animations") local RigFolder = AnimFolder:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name)
Animations = { Quake = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(RigFolder:WaitForChild("Quake")), Slash = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(RigFolder:WaitForChild("Slash")), Stab = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(RigFolder:WaitForChild("Stab")) }
Touch = Handle.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end local Hum = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not Hum or Hum == Humanoid or Hum.Health <= 0 or IsTeamMate(Player,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then return end UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Player) Hum:TakeDamage(Properties.BaseDamage) end)
if Properties.Special then Sounds.SpecialReady:Play() end end
local Seed = Random.new() local AttackSpeed,LastTime = 2,0
function Activated() if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false Sounds.SlashSound:Play() local Anims = {Animations.Slash,Animations.Stab} local RandomAnims = Anims[Seed:NextInteger(1,#Anims)] if RandomAnims.Animation.Name == "Stab" then Properties.BaseDamage = 30 if Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R6 then coroutine.wrap(function() for i=0,120,30 do Tool.Grip = (Grips.In * CFrame.new(0,-2,0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(i),0,0) Wait(1/30) end end)() else Tool.Grip = (Grips.In * CFrame.new(0,-2,0)) end else Tool.Grip = (Grips.In * CFrame.new(0,-2,0)) * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(50),0,0) end RandomAnims:Play(nil,nil,AttackSpeed) local Start = tick() wait(1/AttackSpeed) if (Start-LastTime) <= 0.7 and Tool:IsDescendantOf(Character) and Properties.MiniSpecial then Properties.MiniSpecial = false delay(20,function() EnableSpecialEffects(Properties.Special,true) Properties.MiniSpecial = true end) --Summon Wave local WavePart = Wave:Clone() WavePart.Material = Enum.Material.Glass WavePart.Transparency = .3 WavePart.Locked = true WavePart.Anchored = false WavePart.CanCollide = false WavePart.CFrame = ((Root.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, -Root.Size.Y, 0))) * CFrame.Angles(0,math.rad(-90),0) WavePart.Color = Color3.fromRGB(0,255,204) WavePart.UsePartColor = true
local Velo = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") Velo.MaxForce = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*math.huge Velo.Velocity = Root.CFrame.lookVector*30 Velo.Parent = WavePart
local Splash = Sounds.SplashSound:Clone() Splash.Parent = WavePart
WavePart.Parent = workspace WavePart:SetNetworkOwner(nil) Splash:Play()
Services.Debris:AddItem(WavePart,4)
local AffectedHumanoids = {} WavePart.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end local Hum,FF = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if not Hum or FF or Hum == Humanoid or Hum.Health <= 0 then return end if IsTeamMate(Player,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) or IsInTable(AffectedHumanoids,Hum) then return end table.insert(AffectedHumanoids,Hum) --[[UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Player) Hum:TakeDamage(50)]] Hum.Sit = true coroutine.wrap(function() local Knockback = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") Knockback.MaxForce = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*math.huge Knockback.Velocity = (hit.CFrame.p-WavePart.CFrame.p).Unit * 75 Knockback.Parent = hit Services.Debris:AddItem(Knockback,.5) end)() end) end LastTime = Start Properties.BaseDamage = 24 Tool.Grip = Grips.In Tool.Enabled = true
end
function Unequipped() if Touch then Touch:Disconnect();Touch = nil end if Properties.Special then Sounds.SpecialReady:Stop() end end
function EnableSpecialEffects(Verdict,Wave) for _,attachment in pairs(Handle:GetChildren()) do if attachment:IsA("Attachment") then if attachment.Name == "Effect" then local particle = attachment:FindFirstChildOfClass("ParticleEmitter") if particle then particle.Enabled = Verdict or false end elseif attachment.Name == "SeismicWave" then local particle = attachment:FindFirstChildOfClass("ParticleEmitter") if particle and Wave then particle:Emit(particle.Rate) end end end end end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Activated:Connect(Activated) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
function Quake() Tool.Enabled = false Properties.Special = false EnableSpecialEffects(false) Sounds.SpecialReady:Stop() Animations.Quake:Play() wait(.75) Sounds.QuakeSound:Play() local QuakeScript = script:WaitForChild("QuakeScript"):Clone() QuakeScript.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService QuakeScript:WaitForChild("Creator").Value = Player QuakeScript:WaitForChild("Center").Value = Root.CFrame.p QuakeScript.Disabled = false
delay(3,function() Tool.Enabled = true end) delay(20,function() Properties.Special = true EnableSpecialEffects(true) if Tool:IsDescendantOf(Character) then Sounds.SpecialReady:Play() end end) end
Remote.OnServerEvent:Connect(function(Client,Key) if not Tool.Enabled or Client ~= Player or not Key or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end if Key == Enum.KeyCode.X and Properties.Special then Quake() end end)
EnableSpecialEffects(true)

local Creator,Center = script:WaitForChild("Creator").Value,script:WaitForChild("Center").Value
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instance.new(ty) for k, v in pairs(data) do if type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), }
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
local function Wait(para) -- bypasses the latency local Initial = tick() repeat Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() until tick()-Initial >= para end
function IsInTable(Table,Value) for _,v in pairs(Table) do if v == Value then return true end end return false end
local shockw = Instance.new("Part") shockw.CanCollide = false shockw.Shape = "Ball" shockw.Size = Vector3.new(3, 3, 3) shockw.Transparency = 0.5
local shockMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") shockMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=54068514" shockMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=54068645" shockMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) shockMesh.Parent = shockw
local shockw2 = Instance.new("Part") shockw2.CanCollide = false shockw2.Shape = "Ball" shockw2.Size = Vector3.new(3, 3, 3) shockw2.Transparency = 0.5
local shockMesh2= Instance.new("SpecialMesh") shockMesh2.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=54068569" shockMesh2.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=54068645" shockMesh2.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) shockMesh2.Parent = shockw2
local float = Instance.new("BodyForce") float.force = Vector3.new(0, shockw:GetMass() * workspace.Gravity, 0) float.Name = "Float" float.Parent = shockw
local float2 = float:Clone() float2.Parent = shockw2
local sw = shockw:Clone() sw.Position = Center sw.Parent = workspace sw.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0) sw:SetNetworkOwner(nil)
local sw2 = shockw2:Clone() sw2.Position = Center sw2.Parent = workspace sw2.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, -10, 0) sw2:SetNetworkOwner(nil)
local SizeInc = .5
--[[local QuakeBox = Create("Part"){ CanCollide = false, Transparency = 0.5, Position = Center, Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*(180), Anchored = true, Color = Color3.fromRGB(0,255,0), Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, Parent = workspace } Services.Debris:AddItem(QuakeBox,.5)]]
local Seed = Random.new()
local Neg,Pos = Center - Vector3.new(1,1,1) * 250, Center + Vector3.new(1,1,1) * 250
local QuakeRegion = Region3.new(Neg,Pos) local QuakedHumanoids = {}
for _,part in pairs(workspace:FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(QuakeRegion,{Creator.Character},1500)) do if part and part.Parent and (part.Position-Center).Magnitude <= 200/2 then local Hum,FF,Center = part.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),part.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField"),part.Parent:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") or part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") or part.Parent:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if Hum and not FF and not IsTeamMate(Creator,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) and not IsInTable(QuakedHumanoids,Hum) then QuakedHumanoids[#QuakedHumanoids+1] = Hum Hum.Sit = true if Center then local Spin = Create("BodyAngularVelocity"){ MaxTorque = Vector3.new(1,1,1) * math.huge, AngularVelocity = Vector3.new(Seed:NextNumber(-20,20),Seed:NextNumber(-10,10),Seed:NextNumber(-20,20)) , Parent = Center, } Services.Debris:AddItem(Spin, 6) end local player = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent) if player then if player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") and not player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui"):FindFirstChild("CameraShake") then local QuakeScript = script:WaitForChild("CameraShake"):Clone() QuakeScript.Parent = player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") QuakeScript.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(QuakeScript, 6) end if not Hum.Parent:FindFirstChild("TripScript") then local TripScript = script:WaitForChild("TripScript"):Clone() TripScript.Parent = Hum.Parent TripScript.Disabled = false Services.Debris:AddItem(TripScript, 6) end end end end end
coroutine.wrap(function() for i = 1, 20,.5 do sw.Mesh.Scale = sw.Mesh.Scale + Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)*SizeInc sw2.Mesh.Scale = sw2.Mesh.Scale + Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)*SizeInc local Neg,Pos = Center - Vector3.new(1,1,1) * sw.Mesh.Scale * 5.5, Center + Vector3.new(1,1,1) * sw.Mesh.Scale * 5.5 local Region = Region3.new(Neg,Pos) local CapHumanoids = {} --[[local HitBox = Create("Part"){ CanCollide = false, Transparency = 0.5, Position = Center, Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*(sw.Mesh.Scale*5.5), Anchored = true, Color = Color3.fromRGB(255,0,0), Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, Parent = workspace } Services.Debris:AddItem(HitBox,.5)]] for _,part in pairs(workspace:FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Region,{Creator.Character},500)) do if part and part.Parent and (part.Position-Center).Magnitude <= (sw.Mesh.Scale.X*5.5)/2 then local Hum,FF = part.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),part.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if Hum and not FF and not IsTeamMate(Creator,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) and not IsInTable(CapHumanoids,Hum) then CapHumanoids[#CapHumanoids+1]=Hum UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Creator) Hum:TakeDamage(10-((part.Position-Center).Magnitude/((sw.Mesh.Scale.X*5.5)/2))) local Knockback = Create("BodyVelocity"){ MaxForce = Vector3.new(1,1,1)*math.huge, Velocity = (part.Position-Center).Unit * Seed:NextNumber(100,150), Name = "Knockback", Parent = part } Services.Debris:AddItem(Knockback,.1) end end end Wait(1/30) end end)()
for i = 1, 20,1 do sw.RotVelocity = sw.RotVelocity * i sw2.RotVelocity = sw.RotVelocity * i Wait(.25) end
if sw then sw:Destroy() end if sw2 then sw2:Destroy() end
script:Destroy()

--Made by Luckymaxer --Updated for R15 avatar by StarWars
Character = script.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if Humanoid then Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
Humanoid:ChangeState(Enum.HumanoidStateType.FallingDown)
Humanoid.Changed:Connect(function(Property) Humanoid.Jump = false Humanoid.Sit = true end) end

--Made by Luckymaxer
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
Rate = (1 / 60)
Shake = {Movement = 40, Rate = 0.001}
local CoordinateFrame = Camera.CoordinateFrame local Focus = Camera.Focus while true do local CameraRotation = Camera.CoordinateFrame - Camera.CoordinateFrame.p local CameraScroll = (CoordinateFrame.p - Focus.p).magnitude local NewCFrame = CFrame.new(Camera.Focus.p) * CameraRotation * CFrame.fromEulerAnglesXYZ((math.random(-Shake.Movement, Shake.Movement) * Shake.Rate), (math.random(-Shake.Movement, Shake.Movement) * Shake.Rate), 0) CoordinateFrame = NewCFrame * CFrame.new(0, 0, CameraScroll) Camera.CoordinateFrame = CoordinateFrame wait(Rate) end

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:Connect(OnChanged)

local Tool = script.Parent
local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote",10)
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Input = (game:FindService("ContextActionService") or game:GetService("ContextActionService")) }
local Player,Character,Humanoid
function Primary(actionName, inputState, inputObj) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer(Enum.KeyCode.X) end end
function Equipped() Player = Services.Players.LocalPlayer Character = Player.Character Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end
Services.Input:BindAction("Primary",Primary,true,Enum.KeyCode.X,Enum.KeyCode.ButtonX) Services.Input:SetTitle("Primary","Quake") Services.Input:SetPosition("Primary",UDim2.new(.5,0,-.5,0)) end
function Unequipped() Services.Input:UnbindAction("Primary") end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
